Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It gave me a good perspective shift on my work. Helped me see errors or gaps which i couldnt see before.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Some feedback was not feedback, more so just complimenting my work again and again. However, this could have been to do how I prompted it. So it was frustrating sometimes when it did not understand my query.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI can give me an answer right at the moment, whereas I would need to wait for my teacher to get back to my via email.
